title: Settlement Profile Template
description: Defines a settlement from outpost to city. Always place settlements near water. Settlement size determines formality, diversity, crime, and resource quality. Every settlement should have a reason for existing in its location.

type.description: Settlement type -- size determines everything from formality to crime to species diversity

sovereign_power_id.description: Which sovereign power this settlement belongs to

location.description: Location on the continent (coordinates or description)

water_supply.description: Water supply -- the most fundamental requirement

species_breakdown.description: Population by species -- should reflect nearby land features

notable_people.description: Heroes, villains, wizards, priests, celebrities, monsters in this settlement

population_disposition.description: Adjectives describing the population (dangerous, safe, quirky, sleepy, bustling, transient, stable)

zoning.description: Residential, commercial, industrial, agricultural, mixed zoning notes

old_town.description: Old Town area -- crowded, historical, possibly dangerous

armed_forces.description: Local guards, cavalry, knights, flying forces, navy present

primary_threats.description: What threatens this settlement and from which direction

reputation.description: What this settlement is known for

secrets.description: Hidden rooms, catacombs, portals, secret organizations -- save until needed

nearby_land_features.description: Nearby land features and their impact

alliances.description: Alliances this settlement holds with other settlements or powers

setting.description: Physical setting and surroundings of the settlement

religious_magic_sites.description: Notable religious or magic/technological sites in the settlement

other_special_sites.description: Other special sites of interest in the settlement

religion.description: Dominant religion(s) practiced in this settlement

nearby_monsters.description: Monsters or dangerous creatures found near this settlement

religious_temples_and_sites.description: Religious temples and sites within the settlement

festivals_and_holidays.description: Notable festivals and holidays observed in this settlement

taverns_and_inns.description: Notable taverns and inns in the settlement

equipment_shops.description: Equipment shops available in the settlement

supernatural_phenomenon.description: Any supernatural phenomena present in or near the settlement

unknown.description: Unknown or mysterious aspects of this settlement yet to be discovered

x-cross-references.sovereign-power-profile: This settlement belongs to a sovereign power
x-cross-references.settlement-master-spreadsheet: This settlement should be listed in the master spreadsheet
